meanings.definition: A flowing together of two or more streams.
meanings.sent1: The confluences of the rivers created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The confluences of ideas led to a successful project.
meanings.sent3: The confluences of flavors in the dish surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The confluences of cultures in the city made it a vibrant place.
meanings.sent5: The confluences of colors in the painting were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A coming or flowing together, meeting, or gathering at one point.
meanings.sent1: The confluences of people at the event were overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The confluences of traffic caused delays in the city.
meanings.sent3: The confluences of thoughts in his mind made him confused.
meanings.sent4: The confluences of stars in the night sky were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The confluences of sounds in the concert hall were harmonious.
